missingFields.message: Request ID, sender email, content, and token are required
missingFields.publisherInfo: Publisher name and domain are required
missingFields.request: Publisher email, requester email, and requester name are required
missingFields.records: Ads.txt records are required (either file upload or JSON data)

notFoundOrInvalidToken: Request not found or invalid token
invalidStatus: Valid status is required (pending, approved, rejected, or updated)
noValidRecords: No valid Ads.txt records found in the uploaded file

adsTxtValidation.missingFields: Line must contain at least domain, account ID, and account type
adsTxtValidation.invalidRelationship: Relationship type must be either DIRECT or RESELLER
adsTxtValidation.misspelledRelationship: "{{value}}" appears to be a misspelled relationship type. Must be either DIRECT or RESELLER
adsTxtValidation.invalidRootDomain: Domain must be a valid root domain (e.g., example.com, not sub.example.com)
adsTxtValidation.emptyAccountId: Account ID must not be empty
adsTxtValidation.duplicateEntry: Duplicate entry found in publisher's ads.txt ({{domain}})
adsTxtValidation.duplicateEntryCaseInsensitive: Duplicate entry found in publisher's ads.txt with different case formatting ({{domain}})
adsTxtValidation.noSellersJson: No sellers.json file found for the advertising system domain {{domain}}
adsTxtValidation.directAccountIdNotInSellersJson: DIRECT: Publisher account ID {{account_id}} not found in sellers.json file for {{domain}}
adsTxtValidation.resellerAccountIdNotInSellersJson: RESELLER: Publisher account ID {{account_id}} not found in sellers.json file for {{domain}}
adsTxtValidation.domainMismatch: DIRECT: The sellers.json entry domain ({{seller_domain}}) doesn't match the publisher domain ({{publisher_domain}})
adsTxtValidation.directNotPublisher: DIRECT: Seller {{account_id}} is not marked as PUBLISHER in sellers.json (current type: {{seller_type}})
adsTxtValidation.sellerIdNotUnique: Seller ID {{account_id}} is used multiple times in the sellers.json file for {{domain}}
adsTxtValidation.resellerNotIntermediary: RESELLER: Seller {{account_id}} is not marked as INTERMEDIARY in sellers.json (current type: {{seller_type}})
